data.body: Create src/components/directory-browser.tsx. Dialog with navigable directory listing: breadcrumb path bar, editable path input, scrollable folder list with isBeadsRepo badges, Select button. Uses shadcn Dialog, React Query for browse API, lucide icons.

data.title: Directory browser UI component
